name: Simple Clean Cute Resume ~☆
description:
A resume but with my ~ special sauce ~

(ﾉ◕ヮ◕)ﾉ*:･ﾟ✧


Dipping my toes in the sharing my files, maybe this template will tickle the fancy of some of my comrades in arms. I went for something simple and clean.

Let me know how you feel about it! I am all ears.


Featuring nested components and variants for the lines of experience you want to showcase, and autolayout galore.


For the cover, I used John Kappa's Folded Paper Mockup with Shadows to make a snazzier cover page.

(✿◠‿◠)~~
